TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit RoleProvider extends System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderBase
Public MustInherit Class RoleProvider Inherits ProviderBase

summary.span: 定義 ASP.NET 為使用自訂角色提供者提供角色管理服務所履行的合約。

span.span: Defines the contract that ASP.NET implements to provide role-management services using custom role providers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 角色管理被為了讓您輕鬆地為您的 ASP.NET 應用程式使用許多不同的角色提供者。ASP.NET role management is designed to enable you to easily use a number of different role providers for your ASP.NET applications. 您可以使用隨附於.NET Framework 中，提供的角色提供者，或者您可以實作自己的提供者。You can use the supplied role providers that are included with the .NET Framework, or you can implement your own provider. 在實作自訂角色提供者時，您需要繼承抽象類別。When implementing a custom role provider, you are required to inherit the abstract class. 有兩個主要的原因，建立自訂角色提供者。There are two primary reasons for creating a custom role provider. - 您需要在隨附於.NET Framework 中，例如 FoxPro 資料庫、 Oracle 資料庫或其他資料來源的角色提供者不支援的資料來源中儲存角色資訊。You need to store role information in a data source that is not supported by the role providers included with the .NET Framework, such as a FoxPro database, an Oracle database, or other data sources. - 您要管理使用不同於.NET Framework 所隨附的提供者所使用的資料庫結構描述的資料庫結構描述的角色資訊。You need to manage role information using a database schema that is different from the database schema used by the providers that ship with the .NET Framework. 常見的範例會已經存在於 SQL Server 資料庫中的公司或網站的角色資料。A common example of this would be role data that already exists in a SQL Server database for a company or Web site.

MemberSignature.Value: protected RoleProvider ();
.method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
Protected Sub New ()
protected: RoleProvider();

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您不需要實作繼承的類別的建構函式抽象類別。You are not required to implement a constructor for a class that inherits the abstract class. 初始化值實作會傳遞至方法實作。Initialization values for a implementation are passed to the method implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract void AddUsersToRoles (string[] usernames, string[] roleNames);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void AddUsersToRoles(string[] usernames, string[] roleNames) cil managed
Public MustOverride Sub AddUsersToRoles (usernames As String(), roleNames As String())
public: abstract void AddUsersToRoles(cli::array <System::String ^> ^ usernames, cli::array <System::String ^> ^ roleNames);

param.name: usernames
param.span: 要加入指定角色中的使用者名稱字串陣列。

span.span: A string array of user names to be added to the specified roles.

param.name: roleNames
param.span: 要加入指定使用者名稱的角色名稱字串陣列。

span.span: A string array of the role names to add the specified user names to.

summary.span: 為設定的 將指定的使用者名稱加入指定的角色中。

span.span: Adds the specified user names to the specified roles for the configured .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會呼叫指定的使用者與資料來源指定的角色建立關聯的類別。 is called by the class to associate the specified users with the specified roles at the data source. 角色加入至設定。Roles are added to the configured . 是否有任何指定的角色名稱已設定找不到`applicationName`，我們建議您的提供者擲回。If any of the specified role names are not found for the configured `applicationName`, we recommend that your provider throw a . 如果任何指定的使用者名稱未與任何已設定指定的角色名稱相關聯`applicationName`，我們建議您的提供者擲回。If any of the specified user names are not associated with any of the specified role names for the configured `applicationName`, we recommend that your provider throw a . 如果有任何指定的使用者名稱是`null`或為空字串，我們建議您的提供者擲回例外狀況。If any of the specified user names is `null` or is an empty string, we recommend that your provider throw an exception. 如果有任何指定的角色名稱為`null`或為空字串，我們建議您的提供者擲回例外狀況。If any of the specified role names is `null` or is an empty string, we recommend that your provider throw an exception. 如果您的資料來源支援交易，我們建議您包含每個作業在交易中加上回復交易，並擲回例外狀況，如果有任何加入作業將會失敗。If your data source supports transactions, we recommend that you include each add operation in a transaction and that you roll back the transaction and throw an exception if any add operation fails. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範的範例實作方法。The following code example shows a sample implementation of the method. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.IRoleProvider#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.IRoleProvider/CS/odbcroleprovidersnippets.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.IRoleProvider#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.IRoleProvider/VB/odbcroleprovidersnippets.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract string ApplicationName { get; set; }
.property instance string ApplicationName
Public MustOverride Property ApplicationName As String
public: abstract property System::String ^ ApplicationName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定應用程式的名稱，以儲存及擷取角色資訊。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the application to store and retrieve role information for.

value.span: 要儲存和擷取角色資訊的應用程式名稱。

span.span: The name of the application to store and retrieve role information for.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 正由與不同的應用程式的使用者和角色的類別。The is used by the class to associate users and roles with different applications. 這可讓多個應用程式使用相同的資料庫來儲存使用者和角色資訊而不重複的使用者名稱或角色名稱之間發生衝突。This enables multiple applications to use the same database to store user and role information without running into conflicts between duplicate user names or role names. 多個 ASP.NET 應用程式可以使用相同的資料庫，藉由指定相同值的屬性。Multiple ASP.NET applications can use the same database by specifying the same value in the property. 屬性可以設定以程式設計的方式，或是可以設定以宣告方式在 Web 應用程式使用的組態檔中`applicationName`屬性。The property can be set programmatically, or it can be set declaratively in the configuration file for the Web application using the `applicationName` attribute. 如果沒有屬性已指定，我們建議最好讓使用屬性值。If no property is specified, we recommend that the property value be used. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範的範例實作屬性。The following code example shows a sample implementation of the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.IRoleProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.IRoleProvider/CS/odbcroleprovidersnippets.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.IRoleProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.IRoleProvider/VB/odbcroleprovidersnippets.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract void CreateRole (string roleName);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void CreateRole(string roleName) cil managed
Public MustOverride Sub CreateRole (roleName As String)
public: abstract void CreateRole(System::String ^ roleName);

span.span: The name of the role to create.

summary.span: 將新角色加入已設定 的資料來源。

span.span: Adds a new role to the data source for the configured .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會呼叫方法類別，將指定的角色新增至設定的資料來源。 is called by the method of the class to add the specified role to the data source for the configured . 如果指定的角色名稱已存在設定`applicationName`，是`null`，或為空字串，我們建議您的提供者擲回例外狀況。If the specified role name already exists for the configured `applicationName`, is `null`, or is an empty string, we recommend that your provider throw an exception. 如果指定的角色名稱包含逗號，我們建議您的提供者擲回例外狀況。If the specified role name contains a comma, we recommend that your provider throw an exception. 如果您的資料來源限制的角色名稱的長度，比方說，透過固定長度資料行的資料表在資料庫中，我們建議如果角色名稱超過允許的資料來源的最大長度，擲回例外狀況。If your data source restricts the length of the role name, for example, through a fixed-length column of a table in a database, we recommend that you throw an exception if the role name exceeds the maximum length allowed by the data source. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範的範例實作方法。The following code example shows a sample implementation of the method. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.IRoleProvider#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.IRoleProvider/CS/odbcroleprovidersnippets.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.IRoleProvider#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.IRoleProvider/VB/odbcroleprovidersnippets.vb#3)]

returns.span: 如果成功刪除角色，即為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if the role was successfully deleted; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會呼叫和方法類別來設定資料來源中刪除指定的角色。 is called by the and the methods of the class to delete the specified role from the data source for the configured . 當您從資料來源刪除角色時，請確定，您也可以刪除任何使用者名稱和設定的已刪除的角色之間的關聯`applicationName`。When you delete a role from the data source, ensure that you also delete any associations between a user name and the deleted role for the configured `applicationName`. 如果`throwOnPopulatedRole`是`true`，以及所識別的角色`roleName`參數有一個或多個成員，會擲回並不會刪除角色。If `throwOnPopulatedRole` is `true`, and the role identified by the `roleName` parameter has one or more members, throw a and do not delete the role. 如果`throwOnPopulatedRole`是`false`，然後再刪除角色，或不為空白。If `throwOnPopulatedRole` is `false`, then delete the role whether it is empty or not. 如果指定的角色名稱不存在，是`null`，或為空字串，我們建議您的提供者擲回例外狀況。If the specified role name does not exist, is `null`, or is an empty string, we recommend that your provider throw an exception. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範的範例實作方法。The following code example shows a sample implementation of the method. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.IRoleProvider#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.IRoleProvider/CS/odbcroleprovidersnippets.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.IRoleProvider#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.IRoleProvider/VB/odbcroleprovidersnippets.vb#4)]

span.span: Removes the specified user names from the specified roles for the configured .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會呼叫， ， ，和方法要從在資料來源指定的角色移除指定的使用者類別。 is called by , , , and methods of the class to remove the specified users from the specified roles at the data source. 只有已設定的角色會修改。Only roles for the configured are modified. 是否有任何指定的角色名稱已設定找不到`applicationName`，我們建議您的提供者擲回。If any of the specified role names are not found for the configured `applicationName`, we recommend that your provider throw a . 如果任何指定的使用者名稱未與任何已設定指定的角色名稱相關聯`applicationName`，我們建議您的提供者擲回。If any of the specified user names are not associated with any of the specified role names for the configured `applicationName`, we recommend that your provider throw a . 如果有任何指定的使用者名稱是`null`或為空字串，我們建議您的提供者擲回例外狀況。If any of the specified user names is `null` or is an empty string, we recommend that your provider throw an exception. 如果有任何指定的角色名稱為`null`或為空字串，我們建議您的提供者擲回例外狀況。If any of the specified role names is `null` or is an empty string, we recommend that your provider throw an exception. 如果您的資料來源支援交易，我們建議您在交易中包含每個移除的作業，而且您回復交易任何移除作業失敗時擲回例外狀況。If your data source supports transactions, we recommend that you include each remove operation in a transaction and that you roll back the transaction and throw an exception if any remove operation fails. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範的範例實作方法。The following code example shows a sample implementation of the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 會呼叫方法類別以決定角色名稱是否存在於所設定的資料來源。 is called by the method of the class to determine whether a role name exists in the data source for the configured . 如果指定的角色名稱是`null`或為空字串，我們建議您的提供者擲回例外狀況。If the specified role name is `null` or is an empty string, we recommend that your provider throw an exception. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範的範例實作方法。The following code example shows a sample implementation of the method.
